name: Zattoo
goal:
Zattoo with its main headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland is the largest Internet-TV provider in Europe operating in Germany and Switzerland.
The company has offices in Zurich, Switzerland; Berlin, Germany and Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives:
- EU Satellite and Cable Directive
- Digital Single Market
- Copyright and the Single Market
- Net Neutrality
